divs: sighting detailsi was returning home from the yucca valley area of san bernardino county, california. i was a deputy sheriff assigned to the yucca valley station and had finished work about 2am. i lived in the san bernardino area and it took me about an hour or so to drive the distance home. i was south bound on hwy 247 that extends from the 10 freeway to yucca valley\morongo valley area just prior to the palm springs offramp. the night was dark with no moon, i remember saying to myself how dark the desert road was and just stared out into my headlights as i drove along. i was about half way between the small hills below morongo valley and the 10 freeway on hwy 247, when all of a sudden everything turned into daylight, i was able to see the surrounding desert terrain for about 100 yards in all directions, its was like the sun came up suddenly. as quick as the lights came on they went out again and everything seemed darker than before. i was traveling about 60 mph, but had slowed down when the place lite up. i glanced to my right and observed a huge object i will call a craft for no better words to describe it. the craft was traveling parallel to my vehicle, i slowed down almost to a stop, the craft almost appeared sort of cigar shaped with bluish-green lighting along the side i was observing. i completely stopped my vehicle and stepped out into the darkness and noted the craft was huge, about 100 plus meters long and was hovering above the ground. i didn't note any landing type gear or hear engine noise. the object was about 50 meters away from my location at that time. as i was watching the craft i noticed it was actually moving directly away from me across the desert toward some small hills. when the craft got approx. a quarter to half mile away it turned in an upward motion and i discovered it wasen't long like a cigar, but oval like a disc, i could see the bluish-green lights around the exterior of the craft. the craft seemed to move effortlessly, i never noticed any exhust system. as i stood and watched the craft from the bottom view, all of a sudden it turned toward the southwestern sky and left so quickly the only way i can describe its departure is that if i blinked my eyes it flew off that fast leaving a light type trail for only a second something like when you wave a flashlight through the night and you see that quick flash of trailing light. i remember just standing in the dark along that highway sort of dumbfounded. i was never scared or threatened by the craft, but i would sure like to take another close up look at it. i served in special forces, i was in intelligence, i had a top secret crypto security clearance, i observed up close the american spy plane flying out of south vietnam in 1968, iam a retired police officer, but never in my life did i ever experience something like what i observed in november 1979 along a darkened desert road, i only wish someone could have been with me. i never really told people about what happened because i felt they would laugh at me or something. i did check with local law enforcement and watched the local papers to see if anything had been reported the following few days, but to my knowledge nothing was reported. thank you
Summary: driving car observed huge craft type object moving parallel to my vehicle approx. 50 yards away with lights so strong they lite up the dard desert terrain as though it was a sunny day.
